name: com.gabisou.scriptabletools
description:
Scriptable Tools is a lightweight ScriptableObject-oriented architecture toolkit for Unity.
▪ Scriptable Variables (constant-or-variable references)
▪ Scriptable Events (Inspector-wired broadcasts)
▪ Runtime Sets (live collections)
▪ Relays & listeners (react to state changes)
Build decoupled, designer-friendly systems with minimal overhead.
